Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Thanks for reporting this problem ~RyanWest . We are aware that Indy SDK CLI doesn't currently run on MacOS. We'll add this bug to the epic and work on it when start that effort.

Action.author: ryanwest
Action.body: One of the updates to indy-sdk must have fixed whatever bug was happening. I've also installed a lot of dependencies for other repos such as indy-plenum and indy-crypto, but the segmentation fault is gone and I can use indy cli as normal now.
